description:
"Common Hebrew Made Easy" - Learn Hebrew in just 5 days!!!

The course "Common Hebrew Made Easy" is an outcome of a unique methodology to learn Hebrew. "The 5 Days Hebrew Sprint" is a breakthrough technique of learning Hebrew in a fun and exciting way.

What is the course about?

  • Do you need Common Hebrew for work purposes? >> you got to the right place :)
  • Do you need Common Hebrew for social interactions? >> you got to the right place :)
  • Or do you just need Common Hebrew for another use? >> you got to the right place :)

What you'll get:

  • Learn most up-to date common Hebrew terminology and phrases.
  • Discover the most relevant phrases and vocabulary of common Hebrew speaking.
  • Enhance your Hebrew skills to achieve great first impression.

Who is it for:

  • This course is suitable for all levels who want to learn Hebrew or just fine-tune their language with common Israeli phrases.

The course consist of:

  • 12 videos lessons (and 2 bonus lessons)
  • 5 Quizzes
  • 2 hours of video content

Why should I take this course?

  • By the end of this course, you will be familiar with common Hebrew sentences and major key phrases.
  • After completing the course you will be able to communicate in practical, day-to-day situations in Hebrew and develop a natural understanding of the language.
title: Common Hebrew Made Easy - Learn Hebrew in just 5 days!!!
